name: First Horizon Corporation
description: First Horizon Corporation is a leading financial services company based in the United States, focused on delivering a wide range of banking and financial solutions to its clients. With a rich history dating back to 1864, the company has grown through a combination of organic growth and strategic acquisitions, including the recent merger with IBERIABANK, significantly expanding its footprint in the Southeastern U.S. First Horizon offers a comprehensive suite of services including commercial banking, consumer banking, wealth management, and insurance. The company is committed to providing exceptional customer service and innovative financial products tailored to meet the needs of individuals and businesses. First Horizon is dedicated to community engagement and responsible banking, supporting various initiatives aimed at improving the financial well-being of the communities it serves. The company operates through numerous branches and ATMs across several states, ensuring accessibility and convenience for its customers. With a focus on technology and digital banking solutions, First Horizon aims to enhance customer experiences while maintaining its traditional values of trust and integrity. The company’s mission is to be a trusted partner in financial success, fostering long-term relationships built on mutual respect and collaboration.
